sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useSelector} from "react-redux"; import "../../styles/SinglePage.css" import { useEffect } from "react"; import GetAllProducts from "../../api/products"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; export const SinglePostPage = ({ match }) => { const { postId } = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(GetAllProducts()); }, [dispatch]); const post = useSelector((state) => state.posts.posts.find((post) => post._id === postId) ); console.log(post); return (

); };
